list.name: PHASE-SHIFTER
list.description: Max dashes forward, and becomes immune to all damage from enemies while dashing.
list.descriptionHtml: Max dashes forward, and becomes immune to all damage from enemies while dashing.

list.name: SNEAKY-SNEAKERS
list.description: Max blinks back to a place of her choosing after x seconds' delay, recovering any damage she received in the meantime.
list.descriptionHtml: Max blinks back to a place of her choosing after x seconds' delay, recovering any damage she received in the meantime.
